uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

vlan_id.description: The unique ID of the VLAN where IGMP is configured

is_igmp_enabled.description: Whether IGMP protocol is enabled on the VLAN

last_member_query_interval.description: IGMP last member query interval. Value will be ignored if is_igmp_enabled is false

querier.description: IGMP Querier. Value will be ignored if is_igmp_enabled is false

query_max_response_time.description: IGMP query max response time. Value will be ignored if is_igmp_enabled is false

robustness.description: IGMP robustness. Value will be ignored if is_igmp_enabled is false

version.description: IGMP version. Value will be ignored if is_igmp_enabled is false
